name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
週次　　單元主題(聽講活動)
第 1 週　　 Orientation & Academic Life Around the World
第 2 週　　 Introducing Yourself or Others
第 3 週　　 Telephone Messages
第 4 週　　 Experiencing Nature
第 5 週　　 Talking About Weather & Seasons/Abilities/Likes & Dislikes
第 6 週　　 Living to Eat or Eating to Live
第 7 週　　 Eating Habits
第 8 週  Review Work /Mid-term Exam
第 9 週　　 全校英文期中會考(試題預先公佈在學校網站)
第 10 週 Ordering food
第 11 週 Popular foods in Taiwan
第 12 週 In the Community: Talking About running errands
第 13 週 Describing locations in a city (ex. Taipei)
第 14 週 Describing your neighborhood/Comparing cities and Towns
第 15 週 Home & Family: Finding Somewhere to Live
第 16 週 Talking about A Moving Day/Interviewing someone about an apartment
第 17 週 Review Work /Final Exam
第 18 週 全校英文期中會考(試題預先公佈在學校網站)
scorePolicy:
上課出席    20%
作業        20%
小考        10%
口語表達    10%
全校英文會考成績  30%
materials:
Interactions 1--Reading (By E. Kirn & P. Hartmann,McGraw Hill) (Required)
Interactions 1--Listening/Speaking (By J.Tanka etc.,McGraw Hill) (Required)
